name: Thirty institutions reporting the most FY 2021 research space in all fields: FYs 2017 to 2021
description: Thirty institutions reporting the most FY 2021 research space in all fields: FYs 2017 to 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Net assignable square feet in thousands

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The leading 30 institutions reflect the totals for FY 2021. Some institutions may not have been in the top 30 prior to FY 2021. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities.
